hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: just a friendly reminder that school is still in session, in distance learning mode. please be in contact with your student's teacher(s) and check google classroom for updates and those without technology, look for updates in the mail. if you have not had contact with the school (teachers), please call your respective school office.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Rescheduled Dates for the Crocker High School Class of 2020:
(Also dates are subject to change depending on CDC, State, and Pulaski County Health Department guidelines at the time)
Also, please do not ask for any more details concerning this, this is all the details we have at the current time.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: PROM has been canceled for the 2019-20 school year.
Project Graduation has been canceled for the 2019-20 school year.

div.p: SENIORS: If you have NOT paid your dues in full, you still have time to do so. You must have all dues paid for in order to participate in the project graduation prize gift cards or possible other gifts. (Those students who are eligible will get these gifts at a later date.) The deadline to have your class dues in full must be paid by May 8, 2020.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

img.span: COVID-19 MS-HS Parent-Student Information Release - April 4.pdf

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: PICK-UP TIME IS FROM 11:00 A.M. TO 1:00 P.M.

p.strong: PICK-UP LOCATION IS IN THE BACK PARKING LOT NEXT TO THE BACK DOOR OF THE CAFETERIA
DELIVERY OF MEALS TO THOSE WHO CANNOT ARRANGE FOR MEAL PICK-UP WILL BE ON MONDAYS AND THURSDAYS (STARTING APRIL 9TH).
ONCE A CHOICE IS MADE BETWEEN PICK-UP OR DELIVERY, NO CHANGES WILL BE ALLOWED.

h2.div: "help stop the spread - stay home instead!"

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: Because of HB-604 -2019, all parents who accompany students on trips or volunteer to assist our School with students or student activities of any kind are now required to have the same background check that our staff has. As of August 2019, the cost of this background check is approximately $59. Contact the Superintendent's Office for more information.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: WE HAVE P.R.I.D.E. - Positive Responsible Individuals Dedicated to Excellence
601 N Commercial PO Box 488 St. Crocker, MO 65452 ~~ Phone 573.736.5000

em.strong: VISION STATEMENT: The Crocker R-II School District is a place where students will make critical choices for their own success. Students will establish yearly goals that lead to college and career readiness. The district and community will work together to provide instruction that build 21st century skills.
